"},{"term":","},{"term":"sagte"},{"term":"Weber"},{"term":"."}],[{"term":"Sie"},{"term":"habe"},{"term":"das"},{"term":"Kuvert"},{"term":"an"},{"term":"den"},{"term":"Parteivorsitzenden"},{"term":"weitergereicht"},{"term":"."}],[{"term":"Den"},{"term":"Waffenhändler"},{"term":"Karlheinz"},{"term":"Schreiber"},{"term":"habe"},{"term":"sie"},{"term":"\""},{"term":"nie"},{"term":"gesehen"},{"term":"\""},{"term":"."}],[{"term":"Juliane"},{"term":"Weber"},{"term":"kam"},{"term":"bereits"},{"term":"1964"},{"term":"zunächst"},{"term":"als"},{"term":"Sekretärin"},{"term":"des"},{"term":"damaligen"},{"term":"rheinland"},{"term":"-"},{"term":"pfälzischen"},{"term":"CDU"},{"term":"-"},{"term":"Fraktionschefs"},{"term":"zu"},{"term":"Kohl"},{"term":"."}],[{"term":"Später"},{"term":"folgte"},{"term":"sie"},{"term":"ihm"},{"term":"ins"},{"term":"Bonner"},{"term":"Kanzleramt"},{"term":"."}]],[[{"term":"Neben"},{"term":"Weber"},{"term":"soll"},{"term":"auch"},{"term":"Kohls"},{"term":"Sprecher"},{"term":"Michael","annotation":{"label":"PER","length":2}},{"term":"Roik"},{"term":"als"},{"term":"Zeuge"},{"term":"zur"},{"term":"Herkunft"},{"term":"der"},{"term":"Spenden"},{"term":"befragt"},{"term":"werden"},{"term":"."}],[{"term":"Als"},{"term":"weiterer"},{"term":"Zeuge"},{"term":"soll"},{"term":"sich"},{"term":"der"},{"term":"frühere"},{"term":"Generalbevollmächtigte"},{"term":"des"},{"term":"Flick"},{"term":"-"},{"term":"Konzerns"},{"term":","},{"term":"Eberhard"},{"term":"von"},{"term":"Brauchitsch"},{"term":","},{"term":"zu"},{"term":"seinen"},{"term":"Verbindungen"},{"term":"zu"},{"term":"Kohl"},{"term":"äußern"},{"term":"."}]]]}
